text: okuggya obwakabaka ku nnyumba ya Sawulo, n’okunyweza entebe ey’obwakabaka eya Dawudi okufuga Isirayiri ne Yuda okuva ku Ddaani okutuuka e Beeruseba3:10 Okuva ku Ddaani okutuuka e Beeruseba ebigambo ebyo byakozesebwanga okulaga ensi ya Isirayiri gye yali ekoma, ng’eva mu bukiikakkono obw’ewala ennyo okutuuka mu bukiikaddyo obw’ewala ennyo.”
